Class Level

java.lang.Object
com.comp2042.model.game.data.Level
public class Level extends Object
Represents the current game level and provides constants for level thresholds and speeds. Uses an IntegerProperty for binding to display the level in the GUI.

  • Property Summary

    Properties

    Property
